mapper.insert:
select sequence1.nextval from dual
insert into tbcar (carid,carnum,starttime,usertype,enterimgsrc,paystate) values (#{carId},#{carNum},#{startTime},#{userType},#{enterImgSrc},#{payState})
mapper.select: select carnum,paname as usertypename,starttime from tbcar c,tbparameter p where carnum=#{carNum} and c.usertype=p.paid order by starttime desc
